data.title: Word extraction
data.statement:
Write a program to extract all words beginning with a vowel ({{a}}, {{e}}, {{i}}, {{o}}, {{u}}, {{A}}, {{E}}, {{I}}, {{O}}, {{U}}) in a given text. Your program must read the text and return the extracted words, each on a new line. 
You can use regular expressions. 
For compound words, only the first letter of the first word counts. 
Words are separated by a space.
Each word excludes any trailing punctuation marks, such as {{,}} or {{.}}

testCases.title: Test 1
testCases.testIn:
Ancient amours, ardent and true,
Awoke in an autumn's glow,
An angel's eyes, an ardent hue,
testCases.testOut:
Ancient
amours
ardent
and
Awoke
in
an
autumn's
An
angel's
eyes
an
ardent

testCases.title: Validator 1
testCases.testIn:
Adored, admired, and always new,
An everlasting love began,
An amorous tale of two.
testCases.testOut:
Adored
admired
and
always
An
everlasting
An
amorous
of

testCases.title: Test 2
testCases.testIn:
Every evening, eyes would meet,
Eternal emotions stirred,
Echoes of endless love,
testCases.testOut:
Every
evening
eyes
Eternal
emotions
Echoes
of
endless

testCases.title: Validator 2
testCases.testIn:
Enchanted, entwined, they'd weave,
Each embrace, an eternal vow,
Eternally, they'd be true.
testCases.testOut:
Enchanted
entwined
Each
embrace
an
eternal
Eternally

testCases.title: Test 3
testCases.testIn:
Infinite, intense, their bond,
Inspired by inner light,
Illuminated by the moon,

testCases.title: Validator 3
testCases.testIn:
Inseparable, they'd swoon,
In every instance, love would grow,
Inevitably, they'd unite.
testCases.testOut:
Inseparable
In
every
instance
Inevitably
unite

testCases.title: Test 4
testCases.testIn:
Ocean's waves, their hearts would sway,
Oaths of love, they'd often say,
Overwhelmed by passion's tide,

testCases.title: Validator 4
testCases.testIn:
Oblivious to time's stride,
Only love, their guide,
Obliged to be each other's side.

testCases.title: Test 5
testCases.testIn:
Underneath the universe's gaze,
Unyielding, their love would blaze,
United, they'd face the night,

testCases.title: Validator 5
testCases.testIn:
Unending, their love's light,
Until the end of time,
Unbroken, their love would shine.

data.constraints:
Text can contain upper and lower case letters, numbers, spaces and punctuation marks. 
A punctuation mark can never occur at the beginning of a word.
data.inputDescription: Three [[strings]] input each on a new line
data.outputDescription: Each [[words]] beginning with a vowel on a new line in the same order as their appearance

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Write a program to extract all words beginning with a vowel (a, e, i, o, u, A, E, I, O, U) in a given text. Your program must read the text and return the extracted words, each on a new line.
You can use regular expressions.
For compound words, only the first letter of the first word counts.
Words are separated by a space.
Each word excludes any trailing punctuation marks, such as , or .
Input
Three strings input each on a new line
Output
Each words beginning with a vowel on a new line in the same order as their appearance
Constraints
Text can contain upper and lower case letters, numbers, spaces and punctuation marks.
A punctuation mark can never occur at the beginning of a word.
Example
Input
Ancient amours, ardent and true,
Awoke in an autumn's glow,
An angel's eyes, an ardent hue,
Output
Ancient
amours
ardent
and
Awoke
in
an
autumn's
An
angel's
eyes
an
ardent
